text: He loko! Apane raba tom darom ate usa dina tom daro jadom na ko'i pita apane putara de kujha kama avega ate na putara, pita la'i kujha karana vala hovega. Besaka alaha da va'ada saca hai. Isa la'i sasarika jivana tuhanu gumaraha na kare ate na hi (ko'i) dhokhebaî€¼aza alaha bare tuhanu dhokha de sake
